page.description: Fires after the user logs in.

section.description: Fires when the user tries to logout. Variables in the 'e' object include:

item.name: e.logoutSucceeded
item.description: either .t. or .f. depending on whether the user was successfully logged out or not.

item.name: e.javascript
item.description: Your event handler can set 'e.javascript' for any Javascript you want to execute (if full page reload after logout is not set to true).
